LOWER(rule.name) LIKE #{name}

SELECT rule.id AS "id", rule.name AS "name", rule.description AS "description", rule.ordinal AS "ordinal", rule.cdate AS "cdate", rule.mdate AS "mdate", rule.enabled AS "enabled", rule.flags AS "flags" FROM MTT_RULES rule WHERE rule.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MTT_RULES (id, name, cdate, mdate, enabled, flags) VALUES (SEQ_MTT_RULE_ID.NEXTVAL, #{name}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{enabled}, #{flags})
mapper.select: SELECT rule.ordinal FROM MTT_RULES rule WHERE rule.ordinal < #{ordinal} ORDER BY ordinal DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT rule.ordinal FROM MTT_RULES rule WHERE rule.ordinal > #{ordinal} ORDER BY ordinal ASC LIMIT 1
